Achievements.Name: DOOMed Recruit
Achievements.Description: Complete the DOOM 3 single player campaign on Recruit

Achievements.Name: DOOMed Marine
Achievements.Description: Complete the DOOM 3 single player campaign on Marine

Achievements.Name: DOOMed Veteran
Achievements.Description: Complete the DOOM 3 single player campaign on Veteran

Achievements.Name: DOOMed Nightmare
Achievements.Description: Complete the DOOM 3 single player campaign on Nightmare

Achievements.Name: DOOMed Collector
Achievements.Description: Collect every PDA in DOOM 3

Achievements.Name: I Like to Watch
Achievements.Description: Find all video logs in DOOM 3

Achievements.Name: That was Close!
Achievements.Description: Kill an enemy with 1 health remaining in DOOM 3, RoE, or Lost Mission

Achievements.Name: Goody Finder
Achievements.Description: Open all storage lockers in DOOM 3

Achievements.Name: Unarmed Badass
Achievements.Description: Kill 20 enemies with the fists/melee hands in DOOM 3

Achievements.Name: To Be or Not to Be
Achievements.Description: Kill the scientist trapped next to the Reactor Control Room in DOOM 3

Achievements.Name: Double the Fun!
Achievements.Description: Kill 2 Imps with one shotgun blast in DOOM 3, RoE, or Lost Mission

Achievements.Name: Killing time
Achievements.Description: Score 25000 on Super Turbo Turkey Puncher 3 in DOOM 3 or RoE

Achievements.Name: Boomtastic
Achievements.Description: Blow up 50 barrels in the DOOM 3, RoE, or Lost Mission campaigns

Achievements.Name: Ready for Action!
Achievements.Description: Get the BFG-9000 from Security Chief's office in DOOM 3

Achievements.Name: Not a Scratch
Achievements.Description: Complete a level without taking any damage in DOOM 3, RoE, or Lost Mission (except Mars City)

Achievements.Name: RAGE
Achievements.Description: Find the RAGE logo in the Lost Mission

Achievements.Name: Speed Run
Achievements.Description: Complete the DOOM 3 single player campaign in 10 hours or less

Achievements.Name: Sticky Situation
Achievements.Description: Defeat the Vagary boss in DOOM 3

Achievements.Name: Cookie Stealer
Achievements.Description: Defeat Guardian boss in DOOM 3

Achievements.Name: You're Not My Boss!
Achievements.Description: Defeat Sabaoth boss in DOOM 3

Achievements.Name: Big Boy
Achievements.Description: Defeat Cyberdemon boss in DOOM 3

Achievements.Name: Bot Buddy
Achievements.Description: Keep a Sentry Bot alive to its destination in DOOM 3, RoE, or Lost Mission (except Mars City)

Achievements.Name: Ripped!
Achievements.Description: Use the chainsaw to kill 20 enemies in DOOM 3

Achievements.Name: All of Us
Achievements.Description: Find the id logo secret room in DOOM 3

Achievements.Name: You Laugh, It Works
Achievements.Description: Find the bloody handiwork of Betruger (in Delta 4 Hallway) in DOOM 3

Achievements.Name: Turncoat
Achievements.Description: Get 2 demons to fight each other in DOOM 3, RoE, or Lost Mission

Achievements.Name: Soulfood
Achievements.Description: Use the Soul Cube to defeat 20 enemies in DOOM 3

Achievements.Name: Evil Recruit
Achievements.Description: Complete the RoE campaign on Recruit

Achievements.Name: Evil Marine
Achievements.Description: Complete the RoE campaign on Marine

Achievements.Name: Evil Veteran
Achievements.Description: Complete the RoE campaign on Veteran

Achievements.Name: Evil Nightmare
Achievements.Description: Complete the RoE campaign on Nightmare

Achievements.Name: Evil Collector
Achievements.Description: Collect every PDA in the RoE campaign

Achievements.Name: Too Slow, Fool!
Achievements.Description: Kill 5 enemies at once while in Hell Time in RoE

Achievements.Name: Gimme Time!
Achievements.Description: Defeat the Helltime Hunter in RoE

Achievements.Name: Gimme Power!
Achievements.Description: Defeat the Berserk Hunter in RoE

Achievements.Name: Shocking!
Achievements.Description: Defeat the Invulnerability Hunter in RoE

Achievements.Name: Eat This!
Achievements.Description: Defeat the Maledict boss in RoE

Achievements.Name: Play Catch
Achievements.Description: Kill 20 enemies with projectiles launched from the Grabber in RoE

Achievements.Name: Fists of Fury
Achievements.Description: Use the Artifact with Berserk ability to punch out 20 enemies in RoE

Achievements.Name: Lost Recruit
Achievements.Description: Complete the Lost Mission campaign on Recruit

Achievements.Name: Lost Marine
Achievements.Description: Complete the Lost Mission campaign on Marine

Achievements.Name: Lost Veteran
Achievements.Description: Complete the Lost Mission campaign on Veteran

Achievements.Name: Lost Nightmare
Achievements.Description: Complete the Lost Mission campaign on Nightmare

Achievements.Name: Lost Collector
Achievements.Description: Collect every PDA in the Lost Mission campaign

Achievements.Name: Telefragged!
Achievements.Description: Kill an enemy player by jumping into a teleporter after them in DOOM 3 Multiplayer

Achievements.Name: Crushed!
Achievements.Description: Catch an enemy player in the Reactor of Frag Chamber in DOOM 3 Multiplayer

Achievements.Name: Ninja Killer
Achievements.Description: Kill 5 enemy players while using Invisibility in DOOM 3 Multiplayer

Achievements.Name: Clean Sheet
Achievements.Description: Complete a DOOM 3 Multiplayer match without dying

Achievements.Name: Berserked!
Achievements.Description: Use Berserk to kill a player in DOOM 3 Multiplayer

Achievements.Name: 2 Deaths - 1 Gun
Achievements.Description: Kill two enemies in the same room with a rocket in DOOM 3 Multiplayer
